nodes.title: Real Estate Negotiations in the Covid Environment with Knight Frank
nodes.excerpt: Join James Johnston, Occupier Solutions of Knight Frank and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin on discussing the current issues the real estate industry is facing including negotiating leases due to the current COVID environment.
nodes.content: Join James Johnston, Occupier Solutions of Knight Frank and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin on discussing the current issues the real estate industry is facing including negotiating leases due to the current COVID environment.

nodes.title: Current State of Environment on a Macro & Micro Level with Macquarie Bank
nodes.excerpt: Join Martin Lakos, Division Director Macquarie Wealth Management, Andrew Knowles, National Segment Head – Insolvency, Business Banking, Macquarie Bank and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin to discuss the outlook of the Australian economy.
nodes.content:
Join Martin Lakos, Division Director Macquarie Wealth Management, Andrew Knowles, National Segment Head – Insolvency, Business Banking, Macquarie Bank and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin to discuss the outlook of the Australian economy.

                         We will:      

  • Look at a global big picture view
  • Drilling down to our outlook in Australia
  • Looking into interest rates, business and consumer confidence
  • Business investment and property
  • What macro themes we believe will play out this decade

nodes.title: Cyber Crime with James Linton
nodes.excerpt:
Join James Linton, Ben Jones, Managing Director of Continuum Cyber and Domenic Calabretta, CEO of Mackay Goodwin as they discuss:

Importance of cyber education
Why Cyber security is necessary
A CEO’s experience with Cyber Crime

Attendees will receive the opportunity for a free cyber health check and access to a free eBook on how to secure your business.
nodes.content:
We are excited to launch Mackay Goodwin’s MG Academy, kicking off with our first webinar on Cyber Crime featuring the notorious James Linton aka email prankster. Following his spear phishing bonanzas of the White House and Bank of England, now James has partnered with MG Academy and Continuum Cyber to create awareness to companies and help employees make better security decisions. Lawyers and accountants are ultimately sitting ducks and the most sought after targets when it comes to Cyber Security. Our webinar will provide the importance of education and why it can save 95% of all attacks.

Join James Linton, Ben Jones, Managing Director of Continuum Cyber and Domenic Calabretta, CEO of Mackay Goodwin as they discuss:

Importance of cyber education
Why Cyber security is necessary
A CEO’s experience with Cyber Crime

Attendees will receive the opportunity for a free cyber health check and access to a free eBook on how to secure your business.

When: Tuesday 31st August

Time: 11:30am

Where: Via Zoom

Register Now
